column3:
As they went to the doors they saw they had the letters A, B, C, and D on them. What did it
ewlinemean? Alpha, the leader, told everyone to stop and look at the doors, so as to see which
ewlinedoor they would go through. The walls were brown and dirty. The lights were yellow. Door A
ewlinewas blue. This was Beta's choice. Door B was red. Door C was the same color as door
ewlineA. Door D a color no one had seen before. Gamma felt that Alpha needed to make a choice
ewlinesoon before the monsters caught their scent. Delta was the first to voice a choice. He
ewlinewanted to go in the red door. Alpha told him that the old books said to go in the blue
ewlinedoor. This is why it was so hard for Alpha right now. Two doors were blue. Being a good
ewlineleader, Alpha asked everyone what they wanted to do. The final choice was door D. They
ewlinewent in and enjoyed all of time in a world with odd colors.
column4: multiple: What color was door C?
column14: multiple: What color was the door that Delta wanted to go in?
column19: one: What color was door A?
